```{r inlezen}
library(inbolims)
library(tidyverse)

dfRapport <- lims_report_data(project = c("I-19W001-02"), 
                              show_query = TRUE)
dfSamp <- lims_report_samples(dfRapport)
dfXtab <- lims_report_xtab(dfRapport)
lims_xtab_to_csv(dfXtab, path = "test3.csv")
```
